text: The 1967 TCU Horned Frogs football team represented Texas Christian University (TCU) in the 1967 NCAA University Division football season. The Horned Frogs finished the season 4–6 overall and 4–3 in the Southwest Conference. The team was coached by Fred Taylor in his first year as head coach. The Frogs played their home games in Amon G. Carter Stadium, which is located on campus in Fort Worth, Texas. ==Schedule== ==References== TCU Category:TCU Horned Frogs football seasons TCU Horned Frogs football
title: 1967 TCU Horned Frogs football team
